a:LiveDisruption.a:Description: The 07:39 Southern Cross - Swan Hill service will operate without Cafe Bar facilities today. Please consider purchasing your food/beverage prior to departure.<div class="lineBreakFake" style="font-family: Tahoma, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px;"></div>
a:LiveDisruption.a:Title: Cafe Bar Closure - Swan Hill Service

a:LiveDisruption.a:Description: The 14:36 Southern Cross - Seymour service will run at a reduced capacity of 2 Sprinter carriages due to a train fault. Passengers can also board the next departing services to complete your journey. [12:30 03/07]
a:LiveDisruption.a:Title: Service Reduction - Seymour Line
